synopsis.text: Carol and Scrooge, two subjects of inhumane genetic experiments, find themselves on the run in 2029 Japan. Scrooge, possessing psychic abilities and a body altered by genetic manipulations, uses his powers to evade the relentless pursuers hunting them down. As they flee, they encounter Present, a mysterious girl whose destiny appears to be entwined with their own. In this thrilling prequel to the main storyline, Scrooge and Carol must navigate the dangers of a world that sees them as nothing more than test subjects, while unlocking the secrets that lie within Present. With Carol's life on the line, Scrooge must harness the full potential of his powers to protect them and extract the hidden weapon within her. This action-packed anime is a must-watch for fans of sci-fi and psychological thrillers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
